roleset.name: cause to be widely visible
roleset.note: AIR-V NOTES: Verbnet entry 45.4 "other causative", a class so wide-ranging as to be meaningless. (from air.01-v)

roles.note: Arg2 audience predicted by comparison with 'show', but doesn't seem tooccur in real usage. Go figger. (from air.01-v)

example.name: transitive active
example.text: The attacks began when Democratic Rep. James Florio aired an ad featuring a drawing of Pinocchio and a photograph of Mr. Florio 's rival, Republican Rep. Jim Courter.
example.arg: an ad featuring a drawing of Pinocchio and a photograph of Mr. Florio's rival, Republican Rep. Jim Courter

example.name: ergative/pseudopassive
example.text: NBC's comedy had aired Wednesdays at 9:30 p.m. and in five outings had drawn an average of only 13.2% of homes, lagging behind the Jamie Lee Curtis comedy ``Anything But Love'' on ABC and CBS's one-hour drama ``Jake and the Fatman.''
